root.SQL: SELECT 'BDCQZ' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM BDCQZ WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'BDCDYQLGX_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM BDCDYQLGX_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'CFDJ_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM CFDJ_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'DYAQ_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM DYAQ_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'FDCQ_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM FDCQ_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'FWXX_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM FWXX_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'JSYDSYQ_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM JSYDSYQ_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'QLR_1' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM QLR_1 WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'BYDJGZS' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM BYDJGZS WHERE TSZT = '0' UNION SELECT 'BYSLGZS' NAME, COUNT(1) SL FROM BYSLGZS WHERE TSZT = '0'
